title: A Touch of the Void Writing Contest: vote now!
body:
**UPDATE: Voting has closed and [the results can be found here](https://riot.com/2GLtqQD)! Congratulations to all the winners.**


With almost two hundred entries, our writing community came out in force to respond to the Touch of the Void writing prompt. We've been diving deep into all the amazing stories you shared with us, overwhelmed by your creativity and passion. Some of you chose to share tales of loved champions delving deep into lost Shuriman cities; others wrote poetry and prophecies telling of the end times. Others, well - some of you *really* like Vel'koz.

We're pleased to be able to share our finalists list. This wasn't an easy decision with so many fantastic pieces, but this list of our favourites hopefully gives you all a taste of the breadth and originality of submissions.

Take a look, and make sure to vote for your favourite piece below! Votes close midnight 6th April, AEDT.

***

**FINALISTS**

[Subject AD64105 ](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/khYW8Eyg-void-finalist-subject-ad64105)by TTP Trojan Fox
[The Devourer (or: Kog'Maw Wants More)](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/8AYzgZhk-void-finalist-the-devourer-or-kogmaw-wants-more) by mellon collie
[Stepping into a New Skin](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/PpBeatTf-void-finalist-stepping-into-a-new-skin) by Sheren
[An Ill Omen](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/tbUHnHve-void-finalist-an-ill-omen) by Khada Kayn
[A Visitor](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/BNsriJhT-void-finalist-a-visitor) by Incog101
[Veigar](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/xf7ll5xa-void-finalist-veigar) by General Sassycat
[Ionia](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/b5rqEFK5-void-finalist-ionia) by Velaraeda
[The City of the Void](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/N6fg5xWH-void-finalist-the-city-of-the-void) by KanyeWestVEVO
[The Seven Aspects](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/7pZHpY6j-void-finalist-the-seven-aspects) by xLullaby
[MONSTER](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/H7o2LOYA-void-finalist-monster) by H20Dartford

***

**HOW TO VOTE**

1. Read all the entries in the list above.
2. Decide which story you liked best. You only get one vote!
3. Vote for your favourite in the poll below.
4. Come back on Monday 9th April to find out who won!

replies.body: I don’t think I made it in this time, but it was really fun nonetheless. Interesting prompt and good writing practice. Can we make this a regular thing?
an ill omen was my favorite piece of writing without a doubt
Separate competition to view all the Vel'koz entries pls.

I completely forgot to add a title to mine xd

Just wanted to put it out there in case riot folks are watching - i entered to write something (hopefully) good enough to be official lore for Veigar, that boy deserves it.
Dang nearly got first place :P Congrats to all Entries.
loved your story mate, congrats on second!
I had to read Veigar first cause I love him, but man that was brilliant, gave me chills like amazing

Damn, After re reading my story i realised that a little details were off, but I had fun writing my story and had fun writing the stories that made it to the finals (Good job to all) Really hope you do more writing contests like this in the (Hopefully Near) Future. And Good luck to the finalists.

Couldn't submit this time but perhaps I'll be there next time... that is if there is a next time. 
Draw the deadline in front two more weeks and I would've had enough time to give it my damn best shot at giving it a creative spin. The prompt was fairly open after all.
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

Good job to all the entries that made it to the finals! Taking a brief look, it seems like there is a broad range covered here that I'll be invested in reading at some point.
Oh Im sure there be more contests like this in the future
SUCH AMAZING TALENT. I would honestly be happy with any of these winning. Gives me the warm fuzzies for the league community.

I couldn't imagine boiling it down to 10 entries from almost 200. Great Job RIOT Fam. 
Congrats to all the finalists, there were all outstanding reads.
I boiled mine down to 2... and I had to flip a coin. It was the only way due to how amazing they both were.
Big fan of putting the Jhin main in the 4th slot aha {{champion:202}}
